stadium.name: The High-Pass Pitch
stadium.description: A field built at a breathtaking altitude in a fortified mountain pass. The air is painfully thin, and the weather is dangerously unpredictable.

stats.pregame_ritual: Tying a small, hand-carved wooden bird to their gear.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Whispering a secret fear to the Trollball before the game.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Exchanging well-wishes with their direct opponent before the game starts.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Whispering a secret fear to the Trollball before the game.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Patting every beast of burden they see on the way to the match.
Spitting into their own hand and then slapping their face with it.
Exchanging well-wishes with their direct opponent before the game starts.

stadium.name: The Old Fort
stadium.description: The team plays within the crumbling, stone-ringed ruins of an ancient hill-fort. The 'runes' are just old, weathered carvings on the standing stones that serve as obstacles.

stats.pregame_ritual: Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Patting every beast of burden they see on the way to the match.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Spitting into their own hand and then slapping their face with it.
Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
A toast of goat's milk to the health of their rivals.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.

preGame:
üéôÔ∏è **GOOD EVENING, OSTERRA!** üéôÔ∏è

This is Nok the Corrupter, broadcasting LIVE from the dizzying heights of **The High-Pass Pitch** at Oread's Summit! Folks, the air is thin up here, but the tension is THICK enough to cut with a rusted cleaver! We‚Äôve got a Week 2 spectacle that promises bruises, broken bones, and beautiful brutality! Tonight, the **Kerlauger Runeguard** have marched their way up the mountain to face the **Oread's Summit Tamers**! üèîÔ∏è‚öîÔ∏è

The Tamers are playing in their home clouds, backed by the **Prismatic Troupes**. You know, that circus led by Kython? I usually prefer my entertainment involves screaming rather than juggling, but on the Trollball pitch, hopefully, we get both! Their player **Alwyn Wandy** was seen whispering a secret fear to the ball earlier. Spooky! Or maybe just pathetic? We'll see! Meanwhile, **Odericus Juxon** has been slapping their own helmet until their ears ring. Now THAT is the kind of brain damage I like to see *before* the whistle blows! ü§°üé™

And let's not forget our visitors, the Runeguard! They fly the banner of the **White Ravens**. Ah, yes, Colm's bunch. The man with the handshake of a wet fish and the luck of a black cat under a ladder. But their players are tough! **Lashondra Niehaus** warms up by getting punched in the shoulder, and **Harilda Sigsmond** has the whole team chanting like a cult! I love a good cult! üòà

Can the Runeguard overcome the altitude and the vertigo? Will the Tamers put on a show or just get shown the door? Grab your popcorn and your bandages, folks, because it's **TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL!** Let the mayhem begin! ü©∏üèà
postGame:
üèÅ **GAME OVER! AND WHAT A SCRAP IT WAS!** üèÅ

Keep your healers on speed dial, folks, because the body count was high tonight! The **Kerlauger Runeguard** have scraped out a victory against the **Oread's Summit Tamers** with a final score of **3 to 2**! It was messy, it was chaotic, and it was absolutely DELIGHTFUL! üíÄ‚ú®

The violence started immediately! **Lorilee Aldred** of the Runeguard introduced **Clippard Burr** to the floor with a Katar swipe that I felt in my own horns! But the real highlight of the first half was the rivalry between **Benjie Foulk** and **Mitran Mariand**. These two just couldn't stand each other! A beautiful double-knockout sent them both to the dirt early on! üëäüí• While the bodies were hitting the floor, **Johnna Beetner** slipped through the chaos, dancing past Swamy Ahasuerus to score a TOUCHDOWN for Kerlauger! **1-0 Runeguard!**

The first half ended with **Harilda Sigsmond** and **Zadoc Wyatan** trading blows until neither was left standing. A double knockout to end the half? That's poetry! üìúü©∏

After the break, things got WEIRD. **Shepperd Trefler** tried to make a play for the Runeguard but threw the ball right into the hands of the Tamer's **Zadoc Wyatan**! An interception! But wait! **Lashondra Niehaus** wasn't having any of that hero nonsense. She stripped the ball right back from Zadoc and launched a massive SHOOT from distance! **BAM! 2 POINTS!** The Runeguard go up **3-0**! What a swing! üîÑüöÄ

But the Tamers weren't dead yet! **Swamy Ahasuerus** caught a pass from a revived Mitran and answered back with a 2-point shot of their own! **3-2!** The tension was palpable! üò±

The final minutes were a desperate scramble. Lashondra tried to put it away but fell short. Alwyn Wandy tried to tie it up but couldn't get the distance! And just for old time's sake, **Benjie Foulk** and **Mitran Mariand** knocked each other out AGAIN! I think those two need to get a room or a duel to the death! üòÇ

In the end, the White Ravens' squad held on! Take that, Kython! Your circus acts couldn't juggle their way out of this beating! The **Kerlauger Runeguard** take the win! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off and reminding you: It's not whether you win or lose, it's how much blood you spill along the way! GOODNIGHT OSTERRA! üåôüëπ
